entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait late this morning and this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening and ending before morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
